DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : CONSUMER NEWS
DOC.TEXT: New Balance Faces False-Advertising Charges : The Federal Trade Commission said in an administrative complaint that commercials boasting that New Balance athletic shoes are made in America are misleading because a substantial number of shoes are made in foreign countries . New Balance is disputing the allegations.The company said some shoes are produced in the United States while others are made in foreign countries . The company said the country_of_origin is clearly stated on each product . Separately , Hyde Athletic Shoes Inc. , makers of shoes under the Saucony , Playskool and Barbie brand names , settled charges that advertisements claiming its products are made in America mislead consumers . Hyde neither confirmed nor denied the allegations and said it settled to avoid expensive litigation .
